::Reptilica/Zardus::

With a pained yelp, Reptilica jumps forward, losing his balance and rolling 
down the ramp of the shuttle. He comes to a painfull stop after bouncing a 
few feet, mechfluid leaking from his back. He looks threateningly at the thee 
Vok, hoping Zardus would get them back for this, and then stumbles into the 
base, heading for the CR chamber.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus calmly watches Reptilica make his exit from the shuttle, chuckling 
quetly. How these bots treated Reptilica amused him, Zardus not bothering to 
look at Reptilica as he enters the base.

"What about?" he says, his red optics watching the Vok carefully.
